snippet.title: #BeastSlayerGame #Trailer Beast Slayer Origin (Official Trailer)
snippet.description:
Play Beast Slayer Origin, a TBH-RPG indie game made with RPG Maker. Enter in the Beast Slayer world, explore the hunting features of Monster Hunter and the rpg features of Final Fantasy in a single game.

===

SOCIAL LINKS -

- Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/beastslayergame?igsh=MXRkYzlhb2l2ZXp2bA==

- TikTok : https://www.tiktok.com/@beast.slayer.game?_t=ZN-8u9U5oZI6cg&_r=1
- YouTube : https://www.youtube.com/@BeastSlayerGame

===
